name: Custom rules
description: Disable unwanted rules from the Cops and specify Warnings before Release.

rules.justification: Possible Overflow.
Variables must be initialized before usage.
The name of the local variable is identical to a field, method or action in the same scope.
Only find or get record if you need to access the values. Consider using ISEMPTY.
Do not use the StrSubstNo or string concatenation as a parameter in the Error method.
Only use BEGIN..END to encolse compount statements.
The FindSet() or Find() method on the record must be used only in connection with the Next() method.
Open and Close Parenthesis.
Add PromotedOnly=true to some or all promoted actions to avoid identical actions from appearing in both the promoted and default sections of the command bar.
The Web client does not support displaying Repeater controls in pages of type Card, Document, and ListPlus.
Variable is unused.
Action with name should have a value for the Image property.
Substitute the IF THEN ELSE structure with a CASE.
The record should be modified before saving to the database.
The variable is initialized but not used.
The count of option captions specified in the OptionCaption property for XYZ is wrong.
The Tooltip property for must be filled.
Use of implicit 'with' will be removed in the future. Qualify with 'Rec.'
The number of parameters passed to a string must match the placeholders.
There must be exactly one space character on each side of '+'
Variable declarations should be ordered by type.
Use FieldCaption instead of FieldName and TableCaption instead of TableName in methods that display messages.
Remember to specify either the 'OnAction' trigger or 'RunObject' property on an action.
The EventSubscriber method xxx must be local.
Missing Application Area!
Only use BEGIN..END to enclose compound statements.
The local method XXX is declared but never used.
You must specify a OptionCaption property for all fields which source expressions is not a table field.
Unreachable code detected.
The name of the local variable is identical to a global variable.
The 'FindFirst' method on the record must be used without the Next() method.
The Caption property for PageField must be filled in.
The name of non temporary variables must not be prefixed with Temp
The name of temporary variable 'CustomerTemp' must be prefixed with Temp.
Use a text constant or label for format string in StrSubstNo.
Do not use identical names for parameters and global variables.
To avoid confusion, do not give parameters the same name as fields, methods, or actions in the same scope.
Do not have identifiers with quotes in the name. - should be an error after obsolete field deletion.
